A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie was just plain bad and so many scenes did not make sense or were just bizarre. The most notable one is leia surviving in space for several minutes because reasons. It felt like a bad fan fiction and just made rey unlikable. It made the characters completely useless and it felt like finn's story made no sense and added characters that were completely useless. i think the formula was there just the director could not handle it.
